---
title: "Logistic Multilevel Models"
params: 
    SHOW_SOLS: FALSE
    TOGGLE: TRUE
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---



::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
d3 <- read_csv("https://uoepsy.github.io/data/dapr3_mindfuldecline.csv")
d3$isImp <- ifelse(d3$imp=="imp",1,0)

library(lme4)

glmer(isImp ~ visit + (1+visit|ppt), d3, family=binomial) |> summary()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
